title: Xin Zhao
body: Riot could you please either NERF Xin Zhao or just rework him so he isnt so broken. All he needs is one lifesteal item and then can go full tank and he still destroys. Thank you for your time.

replies.body: they gutted him already. He sucks, you just do more.

xin zhao's great for catching you out for a 1v1, garbage when it comes to late game teamfights. every xin ive played with so far q in, get cc'd then die in every teamfight, even if there fed and dont do this there capacity to do anything impactful is limited to cleaning up at the end of a fight.

He might be strong in the lower rank, but he cant outshine the high rank jgler, example, kha, rengar, elise, grave.

Xin jgl clear is slow, his ganking is decent, his all in leave him no esc and very weak to kitting, need to biuld tanky to be useful in team fight. 

There are lots of items that can halt his dps, example. Tabi, randuin, thornmail, FH.

Beside players at bronze and such they all biuld dps on xin early game, it is very easy to kill him, with any of the OP jgler i mentioned above.

Frozen heart leaves him pretty screwed. cc makes him pretty screwed. you know who is in meta right now? Malphite. his e is a second frozen heart that stacks with frozen heart itself. Nautilus, frozen heart, plus his entire kit is cc. brand, easy burst and cc. morellonomicron, grievous wounds to sotp the healing. Executioners calling, mortal wounds, Varus e, mortal wounds. IDK what else to tell you man, cc and grievous wounds if he heals out the butt. change the way you build against him, and youll change the way he has to play.
